item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, join us for a fun evening as we have our Pajama Party. please come dressed in your favorite pajama or bathrobe! We will be playing board games, group games, and perhaps some massage !

Join us for an evening of fun, laughter and checking out each others best pajamas!

We will be having a "Potluck" dinner so bring something to share.

This event will be hosted by "Munib", the actual address to his home will be sent out only to those who sign up for the event two days before the event begins. He does live in the Topsfield, Ma area.

There will be other meetup groups coming.

Munib's house is very nice, he has a beautiful fireplace, and plenty of space to have a party!

If anyone has any questions or gets lost, you can call me at: 603-312-6735

There will be a "meetup" sign posted on a telephone pole next to his driveway, he has a long dirt driveway.

A $3 donation would be appreciated to cover cost any costs of running this meetup.

See you there!

Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Pajama Party
